dct_description_sm: India. Directorate of Advertising and Visual Publicity. India. Department of Tourism. Alternate title: India, Agra. Some buildings are shown pictorially. With historical notes of Agra. Verso: photographs of relevant sites. In right margin: "1/13/61 PII. English 1,50,000 Nov. 61.".
dct_publisher_sm: Bombay : Directorate of Advertising & Visual Publicity, Ministry of Information & Broadcasting, Government of India for the Department of Tourism, Ministry of Transport and Communication, 1961.
